scenario_text: You have _f1_ cups of flour. A cake recipe requires _f2_ cups. How much flour is left?
You need _f1_ gallons of paint. You already have _f2_ gallons. How much more do you need?
A car needs _f1_ liters of fuel. It already has _f2_ liters. How much more fuel is required?
A plumber uses _f1_ meters of pipe. He had _f2_ meters before. How much is left?
You mixed _f1_ liters of juice, but spilled _f2_ liters. How much juice is left?
